data.name: Swords of Legends Online - Collector's Edition
data.detailed_description:
Special Edition


About the Game

Swords Of Legends Online – Collector’s Edition


The Swords of Legends Online – Collector’s Edition includes a whole bundle of exclusive extras. Deck out your mystical hero all in gold with the additional costume and opulent weapon skin. Or slip into an all-black ensemble and take to the shadows. You also get some fantastic wings (flying mount), plus a set for expanding your residence with an enchanting garden.

Get the full version of Swords of Legends Online plus the following extras:

  • Golden Weaponskin
  • Golden Costume (+Hair)
  • Assassin Costume
  • Fiery Wings (Flying Mount)
  • Fancy Housing Bundle

Cosmetics and bonuses are available across your entire account, so you can gear up further heroes (irrespective of gender).

data.short_description: The Swords of Legends Online – Collector’s Edition includes a whole bundle of exclusive extras. Deck out your mystical hero all in gold with the additional costume and opulent weapon skin.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX-6300 or Intel Core i3-4130
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 or Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse and an internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or Intel Core i5-6600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580 or Nvidia GTX 980Ti
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 90 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse and an internet connection
